task: Write a Python function that parses an AWS S3 bucket name from an S3 URI in the format 's3://bucket-name/key/path' and returns just the bucket name.
Create a JSON object that represents an AWS IAM policy allowing read-only access to a specific DynamoDB table named 'users-table'.
Write a regular expression that matches valid AWS EC2 instance IDs in the format 'i-' followed by 17 hexadecimal characters (e.g., i-0abcd1234efgh5678).
